commit.message:
add MANUAL_RETAIN to msrv

MANUAL_RETAIN uses
- msrvs::STRING_RETAIN
- msrvs::BTREE_SET_RETAIN
- msrvs::BTREE_MAP_RETAIN
- msrvs::HASH_SET_RETAIN
- msrvs::HASH_MAP_RETAIN
